parts.text: {"word":"valerse","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(スペイン語) valer の再帰動詞形。価値がある、役に立つ、～に値する、～を主張する、～を擁護する、～を頼る、～を当てにする、～を自慢する。","english_definition":"(Spanish) reflexive form of the verb 'valer'. To be worth, to be useful, to be of value, to assert oneself, to defend oneself, to rely on, to depend on, to boast about.","examples":[{"sentence":"Hay que valerse por sí mismo en la vida.","translation":"人生では自力でやっていく必要がある。","english_translation":"One must fend for oneself in life."},{"sentence":"Se valió de su ingenio para resolver el problema.","translation":"彼は機知を使って問題を解決した。","english_translation":"He used his ingenuity to solve the problem."},{"sentence":"No vale valerse de mentiras para ganar.","translation":"勝つために嘘に頼るべきではない。","english_translation":"It's not right to rely on lies to win."}],"collocations":["valerse de algo (～を利用する、～に頼る)","valerse por sí mismo (自力でやっていく)"],"synonyms":["aprovecharse de","servirse de","recurrir a","depender de","confiar en"],"antonyms":["desconfiar de","prescindir de"],"conjugation":{"present":["me valgo","te vales","se vale","nos valemos","os valéis","se valen"],"preterite":["me valí","te valiste","se valió","nos valimos","os valisteis","se valieron"],"imperfect":["me valía","te valías","se valía","nos valíamos","os valíais","se valían"],"future":["me valdré","te valdrás","se valdrá","nos valdremos","os valdréis","se valdrán"],"conditional":["me valdría","te valdrías","se valdría","nos valdríamos","os valdríais","se valdrían"],"subjunctive_present":["me valga","te valgas","se valga","nos valgamos","os valgáis","se valgan"],"subjunctive_imperfect":["me valiera/se valiese","te valieras/te valieses","se valiera/se valiese","nos valiéramos/nos valiésemos","os valierais/os valieseis","se valieran/se valiesen"],"imperative":["válete (tú)","valed (vosotros)"]}],"etymology":{"value":"Derived from the Spanish verb 'valer' (to be worth), which comes from the Latin 'valēre' (to be strong, to be worth).","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/baˈleɾse/","syllables":"va-ler-se"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Valerse' is a reflexive verb, meaning the action reflects back on the subject. It often implies using something (a skill, a resource, etc.) to one's advantage or relying on something for support. The preposition 'de' is commonly used after 'valerse' to indicate what is being used or relied upon.","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Yo valgo de mi mismo.","correct":"Yo me valgo por mí mismo.","note":"When using 'valerse' to mean 'fend for oneself', use 'por sí mismo' and remember the reflexive pronoun ('me', 'te', 'se', etc.)."},{"incorrect":"Él vale de su dinero.","correct":"Él se vale de su dinero.","note":"Remember to use the reflexive pronoun when using 'valerse' to mean 'rely on' or 'take advantage of'."}],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["valer (verb - to be worth)","válido (adjective - valid)","valía (noun - worth, value)"],"phrasal_verbs":[]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"Relatively frequent in Spanish.","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"'Valerse' is a verb used to express the idea of relying on something or someone, or making use of something for one's own benefit. It is a reflexive verb, so it requires a reflexive pronoun (me, te, se, nos, os, se). It is commonly used with the preposition 'de' to indicate what is being used or relied upon. For example, 'Se valió de su inteligencia' means 'He used his intelligence'."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Ella se valió de su experiencia para conseguir el trabajo.","translation":"She used her experience to get the job.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"To make use of"},{"sentence":"Tenemos que valernos de nuestros propios recursos.","translation":"We have to rely on our own resources.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"To rely on"},{"sentence":"El ladrón se valió de la oscuridad para escapar.","translation":"The thief took advantage of the darkness to escape.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"To take advantage of"}]}
